ing: 3 cucumbers - halved lengthwise, seeded, and cut into 1/2-inch slices
des: "Light, fresh French side dish I make frequently. Everyone asks what is this and how do you make it. Be careful not to brown your cucumbers. They should be translucent, not browned."
ins: Melt butter in a small skillet over medium-low heat; add cucumbers, tarragon, white pepper, and salt. Saute cucumber mixture until cucumber bits become translucent, 12 to 15 minutes.
